Node.gloss: to be quick|to be hasty|to be rash|sudden
Node.definition: = action by which humans or divine beings act quickly
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= process by which an event happens without delay
literally: to bring out; hence: = action by which humans utter words
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment

= state of absence of wisdom, which manifests itself in excessive anger, talking too rashly and too much, sinful behavior, and laziness, ► and results in poverty, shame, punishment, and trouble and grief for other people; ≈ foolishness is thought to reside in a person's heart (לֵב) the behavior and treatment of fools is often compared to that of animals
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to delay|to linger|to stay|to be slow
Node.definition: = to do something later than expected

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

= state of absence of wisdom, which manifests itself in excessive anger, talking too rashly and too much, sinful behavior, and laziness, ► and results in poverty, shame, punishment, and trouble and grief for other people; ≈ foolishness is thought to reside in a person's heart (לֵב) the behavior and treatment of fools is often compared to that of animals

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

literally: to bring guilt upon (one's) flesh; hence: = causative action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else ► and so brings his/her own body in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the physical body of humans and animals, not including the mind and the inner person

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else
= action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= process by which humans in a position of authority or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to destroy|to ruin|to devastate|to break|to harm
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone brings destruction and suffering upon humans and inanimate objects

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= state of being needy as a result of one's lack of monetary or physical resources, usually resulting in a lower social status with little authority or power and at the risk of being exploited
= action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= an event that takes place
= state in which a person has a relatively high status within the context of a society or a position of leadership
= state in which a person has a relatively high status within the context of a society or a position of leadership
= action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time
= state in which a person has a relatively high status within the context of a society or a position of leadership
= something that is of benefit to humans; often used in rhetorical questions suggesting that nothing is of benefit at all in a certain situation

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another

Node.gloss: to work|to till|to plow (soil, flax)|to dress (a vineyard)
Node.definition: literally, to serve; therefore = action by which workers prepare land of planting and harvesting; also refers to caring for a vineyard, processing linen, or using cattle for working the land
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

Node.gloss: to have (one's) fill > to be contented
Node.definition: literally: to be satiated; hence: = process by which the desire of humans is fulfilled
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= state in which objects are abundant in quantity

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency

Node.gloss: to eat > to enjoy|to eat > to use up
Node.definition: literally: to eat (goods); hence = pattern of actions by which someone makes a living off material goods until they are gone; ≈ often associated with joy

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which an activity achieves its intended results
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= set of particles marking an object or event as a subset of a larger group which has been singled out from among the rest

literally: sight of the eyes; hence: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= state in which an event is experienced as pleasing
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive
= action or pattern of actions by which humans make a physical effort towards a certain goal
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= small quantity of objects or substance
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= state in which there is an abundance of a certain commodity

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= state in which an event is very serious in nature

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event
= process by which males among humans and animals generate offspring
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= a reference to any object
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
literally: to go out (from the womb); hence: = process by which children are born
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= state in which humans are either without clothes or insufficiently dressed; ≈ often associated with poverty or shame
= process by which someone is going to die, described as a movement in one way only
= a reference to any object

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= causative action or process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= state in which an event is very serious in nature
= process by which someone is going to die, described as a movement in one way only

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= something that is of benefit to humans; often used in rhetorical questions suggesting that nothing is of benefit at all in a certain situation

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to be, become vexed|to be, become angry
Node.definition: = state/process by which humans or deities experience displeasure; ◄ caused by someone else's condition or behavior
= state in which humans are lacking physical strength, ◄ as a result of sickness or injury
= process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which an event is performed in a pleasing way
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
literally: to see good; hence: = state in which humans experience well being
= state in which objects are relatively low in quantity, or in which events are relatively low in frequency
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= something that happens to someone; ◄ whether or not as recompense for what he/she has done

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= objects in one's possession that are considered of value

Node.gloss: to eat > to enjoy|to eat > to use up
Node.definition: literally: to eat (goods); hence = pattern of actions by which someone makes a living off material goods until they are gone; ≈ often associated with joy
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which humans undergo certain processes or actions initiated by (other) humans or deities

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= something that happens to someone; ◄ whether or not as recompense for what he/she has done
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= a privilege granted by a deity resulting in the ability to engage in certain activities
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which God keeps humans concerned about or preoccupied with a situation or responsibility
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
